short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can message and create canned responses on vk.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin covers messaging and creating quick replies on vk.com. They can respond faster to other people by creating multiple quick replies. The plugin works very well. We provide 24/7 service to support via chrome and constantly update our add-on.
